form_title.ms_form_title_llm_v1: APPLICATION FOR ALIEN EMPLOYMENT CERTIFICATION, ES-575B

full_text: Screened by NARA, 9/21/2023 FORK E9-575 Budget Bureau No. 44-R1301 APPLICATI FOR ALIEN, EMPLOYMENT CERTI ATION Expiration Date: 8/31/66 PART B - JOB OFFER FOR ALIEN EMPLOYMENT (ES-575B) 2870 IN SUPPORT OF THE APPLICATION FOR ADMISSION OF Ramon Wong Fong Song (Name of Alien - If more than one and for same occupation, attach list) THE FOLLOWING INFORMATION IS SUBMITTED AS EVIDENCE OF AN OFFER OF EMPLOYMENT 1. NAME OF EMPLOYER (Full name of organization; if employer is an individual, give name with last name in capital letters) T. H. Loo Dba HOLLY CAFE, p. O. box 1108, EL Centro, California 2. ADDRESS (Number and Street) (Town or City) (State) (Zip Code) 452 Main Street EL Centro California 3. SIZE OF ORGANIZATION (In terms of Annual Sales, Production Output, Persons 5. DATE BUSINESS OR ACTIV- 6. GEOGRAPHICAL AREA Served, etc.) ITY ESTABLISHED SERVED Mexicali & Annual Sales $83,397.94 55. Imperial Co. 7. PLACE WHERE ALIEN WILL WORK 8. AVERAGE NUMBER OF EMPLOYEES AT 9. NUMBER OF EMPLOYEES WHO WILL PER- PLACE WHERE ALIEN WILL WORK FORM SAME WORK AS ALIEN 452 Main, El Centro, Cal. from 5 to 8 one 10. IS THE EMPLOYMENT 11. IS THE EMPLOYMENT 12. ARE ALIEN'S SERVICES SOUGHT SEASONAL? TEMPORARY? YES NO YES NO FOR A NEW JOB TO BE CREATED TO FILL AN EXISTING VACANCY 13. STATE SPECIFICALLY LENGTH OF TIME 14. HAVE YOU BEEN ABLE TO FIND IN THE U.S. ANY AVAILABLE PERSON CAPABLE OF YOU EXPECT TO EMPLOY ALIEN PERFORMING DUTIES OF THE JOB TO BE FILLED permanent f YES NO 15.
